method.name: activate
method.description: Activates the view tester mode for the given source views.

parameter.name: $appID
parameter.description: The application id for the views.

parameter.name: $views
parameter.description: An array of app views to be activated. You can choose "all" for all views. The default value is "all".

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: deactivate
method.description: Deactivates the view tester mode for the application.

parameter.name: $appID
parameter.description: The application id to deactivate the view tester mode for.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: status
method.description: Gets the tester status for a given app view.

parameter.name: $view
parameter.description: The view to check the tester mode. You can choose "all" for all views. The default value is "all".

method.returndescription: True if view is on tester mode, false otherwise.

method.name: getViews
method.description: Get all views on tester mode.

parameter.name: $appID
parameter.description: The application id to get the views for.

method.returndescription: An array of all active view names.
